name: Skyward Pride
title: Sky-Rippin: Skyward Pride
desc: This is a tale of sky-shaking valor. Bearing the will to defend all, let the wind dragon bestow wrath upon its vile nemesis.
in_play_description: The character deals +1 DMG.Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.

skills.desc: The character deals +1 DMG. Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG. (Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
